problem_statement.description: Clear articulation of the human researcher's problem.

key_terms.description: Primary terms (<=5) that capture the essence of the problem.

related_terms.description: Cross-disciplinary terms (<=5) that may help solve the problem.

precision_score.description: Score between 0 and 10 indicating how precise the problem statement is.

constraints.description: Constraints or requirements provided by the researcher.
